BLOCK.QRY: UPDATE PISWOT_DEPOSIT_RETURN_TRN SET STR_TYPE_OF_PAYMENT=?,NUM_AMOUNT_DEDUCTED=?,STR_REASON=?,NUM_AMOUNT_GIVEN_BACK=?,STR_RECEIVED_BY=?,STR_GIVEN_BY=?,DT_RETURN_DATE=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,GDT_EFFECT_DATE=?,GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?,GNUM_ISVALID=?,GNUM_SEAT_ID=?,STR_MODE_OF_PAYMENT=?,STR_CHEQUE_DD_NUMBER=?,STR_BANK_NAME=?,DT_PAYMENT_DATE=?,DT_VACAT_DATE=?,STR_VACAT_TIME=? WHERE STR_BOOKING_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISWOT_DEPOSIT_RETURN_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_BOOKING_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISWOT_BOOK_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=2 WHERE STR_BOOKING_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISWOT_BOOK_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=1 WHERE STR_BOOKING_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISWOT_REC_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=3 WHERE STR_EMPLOYEE_CODE=? AND NUM_HALL_ID=? AND STR_EVENT_CODE=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISWOT_REC_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=2 WHERE STR_EMPLOYEE_CODE=? AND NUM_HALL_ID=? AND STR_EVENT_CODE=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
